name: Bittrex.com - Slick Dark
description:
A slick dark theme for Bittrex covering all the main functionality of the site.

Change the market chart to dark by clicking the gear icon and selecting "Dark" under "Default Themes"

Donate BTC: 15gWweCkmZJXEsPE33y9j4crKX8mcEFr4f
additional_info:
v1.0.1 - Increased Firefox compatibility
v1.0.0 - Initial Release
